channel.title: Whonix-Gateway - edit file torrc

item.title: Whonix-Gateway - edit file torrc
item.dc:creator: u896265715
item.description:
I see

$ sudo nano /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf

Add
EntryNodes {}
ExcludeNodes {}
ExitNodes {}
ExcludeExitNodes {}

$ sudo systemctl restart tor
$ anon-verify
No error detected ))

Nice. Thx

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix-Gateway - edit file torrc
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
u896265715:

In earlier versions, I added to /usr/share/tor/tor-service-defaults-torrc.anondist

Bad idea. Simplified: Is overwritten when Whonix is updated.

u896265715:

Which file can you make custom changes to now?

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor#Configuration

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix-Gateway - edit file torrc
item.dc:creator: u896265715
item.description:
I want to make changes to the file torrc
Need to add:

EntryNodes {}
ExcludeNodes {}
ExitNodes {}
ExcludeExitNodes {}

In earlier versions, I added to /usr/share/tor/tor-service-defaults-torrc.anondist
It had a section - Whonix-gateway
Now only - Whonix-Workstation.
It is now modified.
Which file can you make custom changes to now?

Read full topic
